ExportUpgrades.name: Shock Trooper
description: Shock Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage to their attacks for 28s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Recharge Barrier
description: Electric Shield Augment: Allies that pass through have 35 Shields restored.

ExportUpgrades.name: Transistor Shield
description: Electric Shield Augment: Allies can pick up Electric Shield. 25% of damage absorbed will be added to Volt's Static Discharge.

ExportUpgrades.name: Capacitance
description: Discharge Augment: Converts 1.5% of Damage dealt into Shields split between Volt and Squadmates.

ExportUpgrades.name: Pool of Life
description: Well of Life Augment: On death, marked enemies will drop 1 Health Orbs with a 10% chance of dropping an Energy Orb.

ExportUpgrades.name: Abating Link
description: Link Augment: Reduces Armor Rating by 25% on enemies targeted by Link.

ExportUpgrades.name: Vampire Leech
description: Energy Vampire Augment: Excess Energy replenishes Shields by 85%.

ExportUpgrades.name: Tesla Link
description: Tesla Augment: Every pair of Teslas will connect forming a beam that will cause 100 <DT_SLASH>Slash Damage when contacted.

ExportUpgrades.name: Perpetual Vortex
description: Vortex Augment: Vortex's duration is increased by 50% of its Maximum Duration for each additional Vortex thrown into it.

ExportUpgrades.name: Repelling Bastille
description: Bastille Augment: Enemies within the Bastille have a 50% chance to be repelled every 4s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Jet Stream
description: Turbulence Augment: Turbulence increases Movement Speed by 20% and Projectile Speed by 50% for Zephyr and her allies.

ExportUpgrades.name: Funnel Clouds
description: Tornado Augment: Creates 2 additional tornadoes. All tornadoes are 50% their original size and won't pick up enemies.

ExportUpgrades.name: Target Fixation
description: Tail Wind Augment: Each enemy hit increases Tail Wind Damage by 30%. Damage resets upon landing.

ExportUpgrades.name: Contagion Cloud
description: Toxic Lash Augment: Create 2m toxic clouds, dealing 100 <DT_POISON>Toxin/s for 8s with every kill. Damage is twice as strong for Melee kills.

ExportUpgrades.name: Regenerative Molt
description: Molt Augment: After casting Molt, Saryn regenerates 20 Health/s for 10s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Venom Dose
description: Spores Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive Damage to their attacks for 28s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Negation Swarm
description: Scarab Swarm Augment: Scarab Armor protects Inaros from Status Effects, consuming 6% Bonus Armor for each effect resisted.

ExportUpgrades.name: Elemental Sandstorm
description: Sandstorm Augment: Sandstorm has a 25% chance of inflicting Status Effects based on the Damage Types and mods on equipped Melee Weapon.

ExportUpgrades.name: Desiccation's Curse
description: Desiccation Augment: Killing a blinded enemy with a finisher has a 35% chance of summoning a Sand Shadow.

ExportUpgrades.name: Reinforcing Stomp
description: Rhino Stomp Augment: Iron Skin Health is replenished by 55 for each enemy affected.

ExportUpgrades.name: Ironclad Charge
description: Rhino Charge Augment: Each enemy hit increases Rhino's Armor Rating by 12% for 4s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Piercing Roar
description: Roar Augment: Enemies within 10m will suffer from a <DT_PUNCTURE>Puncture Proc.

ExportUpgrades.name: Iron Shrapnel
description: Iron Skin Augment: Recasting Iron Skin will cause it to detonate, dealing 40% of its remaining Health as <DT_PUNCTURE>Puncture Damage, and knocking down enemies.

ExportUpgrades.name: Blinding Reave
description: Reave Augment: Enemies hit are blinded by fog for 6s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Infiltrate
description: Prowl Augment: Ivara is able to bypass laser barriers and gains 10% Movement Speed.

ExportUpgrades.name: Power of Three
description: Quiver Augment: Quiver fires three arrows and consumes 50 more Energy.

ExportUpgrades.name: Empowered Quiver
description: Quiver Augment: Dashwire grants allies 75% Critical Damage. Cloak arrow has a 50% chance to prevent Status Effects.

ExportUpgrades.name: Piercing Navigator
description: Navigator Augment: Each hit increases the projectile's Critical Chance by 2.5% up to a max of 50%.

ExportUpgrades.name: Concentrated Arrow
description: Artemis Bow Augment: Fires a single arrow that has +20% Critical Chance on Headshots and explodes in a 7m radius. Removes Punch Through.

ExportUpgrades.name: Warding Thurible
description: Thurible Augment: Allies in range take 15% less Damage while channeling Thurible and grant 0.2 additional Energy charge whenever damaged.

ExportUpgrades.name: Lasting Covenant
description: Covenant Augment: Headshot kills increase Critical Chance bonus duration by 1s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Tidal Impunity
description: Tidal Surge Augment: Clears Status Effects and grants 3s of Proc Immunity for yourself and allies that come in contact with it.

ExportUpgrades.name: Curative Undertow
description: Undertow Augment: Allies can enter the pool to regain 15% Health every 1.5s, with each ally in the pool increasing Energy drain on Hydroid.

ExportUpgrades.name: Pilfering Swarm
description: Tentacle Swarm Augment: Enemies held by tentacles have a 25% chance at additional drops.

ExportUpgrades.name: Corroding Barrage
description: Tempest Barrage Augment: Each projectile has a 50% chance of inflicting a <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive Status Effect.

ExportUpgrades.name: Hallowed Eruption
description: Hallowed Ground Augment: The next time this ability is cast it will consume the Hallowed Ground, dealing the remaining damage in a burst with 30% Proc Chance of <DT_RADIATION>Radiation.

ExportUpgrades.name: Smite Infusion
description: Smite Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_RADIATION>Radiation Damage to their attacks for 28s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Phoenix Renewal
description: Renewal Augment: Taking fatal damage while under the effects of Renewal will instead Heal you or allies to 20% Health. This effect triggers only once for each ally every 90s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Defiled Reckoning
description: Reckoning Augment: Health Orbs become unusable by enemies for 2.5s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Hallowed Reckoning
description: Reckoning Augment: Enemies affected by Reckoning spawn zones that increase Armor by 150 for allies and inflicts 100 Damage to enemies over 7s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Fatal Teleport
description: Teleport Augment: Teleport will perform a Finisher on the target, dealing 125% Extra Damage. 50% of Energy cost is refunded on a kill.

ExportUpgrades.name: Tear Gas
description: Smoke Screen Augment: Blinds enemies within 1m for 3s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Smoke Shadow
description: Smoke Screen Augment: Conceals allies for 2s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Rising Storm
description: Blade Storm Augment: Melee multiplier lasts 50% longer before it resets.

ExportUpgrades.name: Seeking Shuriken
description: Shuriken Augment: Hits expose weaknesses on enemies, reducing their Armor by 35% for 2s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Pyroclastic Flow
description: Fire Walker Augment: Accumulate 75% of the damage Fire Walker deals, unleashing it in a trail of fire that lasts 6s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Ward Recovery
description: Warding Halo Augment: 35% of the casting cost returned based on how much protection is left.

ExportUpgrades.name: Safeguard
description: Warding Halo Augment: Can now be cast on allies with 20% effectiveness.

ExportUpgrades.name: Reaping Chakram
description: Blazing Chakram Augment: Each enemy hit increases the ring's Damage by 1.25x and the chance for enemies to drop Health Orbs on death by +0.10x.

ExportUpgrades.name: Creeping Terrify
description: Terrify Augment: Affected enemies have 30% reduced Movement Speed.

ExportUpgrades.name: Discharge Strike
description: Soul Punch Augment: Depletes up to 10 Energy from the target.

ExportUpgrades.name: Soul Survivor
description: Soul Punch Augment: Use on a downed ally to revive him with 15% Health. Nekros's Energy will be consumed.

ExportUpgrades.name: Despoil
description: Desecrate Augment: No longer consumes Energy, but consumes 16 Health per corpse instead.

ExportUpgrades.name: Shield of Shadows
description: Shadows of the Dead Augment: Each Shadow within 50m take 3% of the Damage done to Nekros in his stead.

ExportUpgrades.name: Primal Rage
description: Primal Fury Augment: Killing an enemy increases Critical Chance by 6%. The increase decays by 1%/s

ExportUpgrades.name: Iron Vault
description: Iron Jab Augment: Aiming Iron Jab at the ground launches Wukong into the air. Executing a Slam Attack increases Range by 8m and applies 300% Extra Damage.

ExportUpgrades.name: Enveloping Cloud
description: Cloud Walker Augment: Allies within 2.5m of the cloud become invisible to enemies for 8s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Rift Torrent
description: Rift Surge Augment: Limbo deals 15% Extra Damage for each enemy affected by Rift Surge while in the rift.

ExportUpgrades.name: Cataclysmic Continuum
description: Cataclysm Augment: Duration increased by 0.3s for each enemy killed.

ExportUpgrades.name: Rift Haven
description: Banish Augment: Allies banished to the rift will have 10% of their Maximum Health restored.

ExportUpgrades.name: Shield Overload
description: Polarize Augment: Increases the time for the target's Shields to regenerate by 4s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Counter Pulse
description: Polarize Augment: Enemy weapons are jammed and robotics are disabled for 2s when hit by Polarize.

ExportUpgrades.name: Sapping Reach
description: Pull Augment: Steals up to 10 Energy from the target.

ExportUpgrades.name: Greedy Pull
description: Pull Augment: Adds 40% chance to pull pickups towards Mag.

ExportUpgrades.name: Fracturing Crush
description: Crush Augment: Survivors have their Armor decreased by 20% and become unable to move for 4s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Magnetized Discharge
description: Magnetize Augment: Manually detonate Magnetize by recasting on the target. Enemies hit have a 20% chance to become disarmed.

ExportUpgrades.name: Safeguard Switch
description: Switch Teleport Augment: After teleporting with an ally they will be invulnerable for 3s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Hushed Invisibility
description: Invisibility Augment: Weapon noise is reduced by 50% while invisible.

ExportUpgrades.name: Irradiating Disarm
description: Radial Disarm Augment: Enemies will be affected by <DT_RADIATION>Radiation for 4s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Deceptive Bond
description: Decoy Augment: 20% of damage Loki takes is transferred to Decoy, and vice versa.

ExportUpgrades.name: Savior Decoy
description: Decoy Augment: If Loki takes fatal damage, Decoy absorbs the damage and swaps locations. Also increases Casting Speed of Decoy by 20%

ExportUpgrades.name: Venari Bodyguard
description: Venari Augment: Venari dies in Khora's place. Respawn timer increased to 150s. Killing enemies decreases the timer by 1s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Accumulating Whipclaw
description: Whipclaw Augment: Hitting 3 enemies will grant a 10% stacking Damage Bonus to subsequent Whipclaws. Bonus will decay after 10s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Pilfering Strangledome
description: Strangledome Augment: Enemies held in Strangledome have a 30% chance of dropping additional loot.

ExportUpgrades.name: Singularity
description: Absorb Augment: Creates a ring every 3s that drags in enemies at 9m/s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Assimilate
description: Absorb Augment: Nyx can move at 30% Speed while using Absorb, but the area is reduced by half.

ExportUpgrades.name: Mind Freak
description: Mind Control Augment: Controlled target inflicts +200% Damage.

ExportUpgrades.name: Pacifying Bolts
description: Psychic Bolts Augment: Affected enemies will be confused for 4s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Chaos Sphere
description: Chaos Augment: Enemies entering the Effect Range will be inflicted with Chaos. Effect Range lasts for 25% of the ability duration and shrinks over time.

ExportUpgrades.name: Larva Burst
description: Larva Augment: Reactivate Larva to detonate and deal 150 <DT_POISON>Toxin Damage in a 1m radius. This damage stacks for every enemy grabbed by the Larva.

ExportUpgrades.name: Teeming Virulence
description: Virulence Augment: Hitting 4 enemies with Virulence grants 70% Primary Weapon Critical Chance for 9s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Insatiable
description: Ravenous Augment: Nidus has a 35% chance of generating an additional Mutation stack whenever he gains one, while standing in the Ravenous infestation.

ExportUpgrades.name: Prism Guard
description: Prism Augment: Prism follows above Mirage for 1s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Explosive Legerdemain
description: Sleight of Hand Augment: Ammo and Orbs pickups are turned into proximity mines that deal 150 Damage with a 15% Proc Chance.

ExportUpgrades.name: Total Eclipse
description: Eclipse Augment: While active, allies within 3m gain 25% benefit from Eclipse.

ExportUpgrades.name: Hall of Malevolence
description: Hall of Mirrors Augment: The damage of your doppelgangers is increased by 2% every time you kill an enemy.

ExportUpgrades.name: Mending Splinters
description: Splinter Storm Augment: For each target affected, Splinter Storm heals 1.5 Health/s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Spectrosiphon
description: Spectrorage Augment: Enemies that die within Spectrorage have a 20% chance to drop an Energy Orb.

ExportUpgrades.name: Dread Ward
description: Dread Mirror Augment: Become unkillable for 3s when Dread Mirror kills a target by ripping its life force.

ExportUpgrades.name: Freeze Force
description: Freeze Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_FREEZE>Cold Damage to their attacks for 28s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Ice Wave Impedance
description: Ice Wave Augment: Leaves a frozen trail for 6s that slows down enemies that come into contact with it.

ExportUpgrades.name: Chilling Globe
description: Snow Globe Augment: Enemies that enter have a 30% chance to become frozen solid for 4s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Icy Avalanche
description: Avalanche Augment: Grants allies within the radius with a coat of ice that absorbs 40 Damage per enemy hit.

ExportUpgrades.name: Beguiling Lantern
description: Lantern Augment: Attracted enemies take 25% more Melee Damage.

ExportUpgrades.name: Razorwing Blitz
description: Razorwing Augment: Flight Speed increased by 25% and Fire Rate increased by 25% for 2s when using abilities. Stacks up to 4x.

ExportUpgrades.name: Chromatic Blade
description: Exalted Blade Augment: Exalted Blade's Damage Type changes depending on Excalibur's Energy Color and Status Chance is increased by 25%.

ExportUpgrades.name: Purging Slash
description: Slash Dash Augment: Allies in the path of Slash Dash have 1 debuffs removed and 100 Shields restored.

ExportUpgrades.name: Surging Dash
description: Slash Dash Augment: Each enemy hit during Slash Dash further increases your Melee Counter by 1.

ExportUpgrades.name: Furious Javelin
description: Radial Javelin Augment: Each enemy hit will increase Excalibur's Melee Damage by 3% for 6s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Signal Flare
description: Radial Blind Augment: Enemies blinded are marked on the Minimap for 3s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Radiant Finish
description: Radial Blind Augment: Blinded enemies take 150% more Finisher Damage.

ExportUpgrades.name: Firequake
description: World On Fire Augment: Enemies hit have a 50% chance of being knocked down.

ExportUpgrades.name: Flash Accelerant
description: Accelerant Augment: Accelerant gives +20% Casting Speed and +50% <DT_FIRE>Heat damage to allies within range.

ExportUpgrades.name: Purifying Flames
description: Fire Blast Augment: Allies that enter the fire will have up to 1 debuffs removed.

ExportUpgrades.name: Fire Fright
description: Fire Blast Augment: Damage done by Fire Blast has a 40% chance to cause enemies to panic.

ExportUpgrades.name: Fireball Frenzy
description: Fireball Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_FIRE>Heat Damage to their attacks for 28s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Vexing Retaliation
description: Vex Armor Augment: Taking 150 Damage will trigger a 4m burst. Shield damage will cause a <DT_PUNCTURE>Puncture Proc while Health damage will cause a <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Proc.

ExportUpgrades.name: Guided Effigy
description: Effigy Augment: Cast and hold to make Effigy move to your aim point. Deals 500 Damage/s to enemies in its path and roars on arrival stunning nearby enemies.

ExportUpgrades.name: Everlasting Ward
description: Elemental Ward Augment: Allies that leave the radius will retain the effect for 50% of the remaining duration.

ExportUpgrades.name: Afterburn
description: Spectral Scream Augment: Upon deactivation, Chroma will launch an elemental projectile dealing 25 Damage for each second the ability was active, to a maximum of 200 Damage.

ExportUpgrades.name: Muzzle Flash
description: Shooting Gallery Augment: Does a burst before switching between players, blinding enemies within 5m for 4s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Staggering Shield
description: Shatter Shield Augment: Reflected bullets gain a 30% chance of staggering enemies.

ExportUpgrades.name: Mesa's Waltz
description: Peacemaker Augment: Mesa can move at 35% Speed while using Peacemaker.

ExportUpgrades.name: Ballistic Bullseye
description: Ballistic Battery Augment: Applies a 70% Status Chance bonus to the shot, based on the amount charged.

ExportUpgrades.name: Rumbled
description: Rumblers Augment: Atlas becomes a Rumbler with Rock Armor that can absorb up to 350 Damage.

ExportUpgrades.name: Titanic Rumbler
description: Rumblers Augment: Create a single rumbler with 120% Health, 120% Damage, and 50% Speed that taunts nearby enemies into attacking it.

ExportUpgrades.name: Path of Statues
description: Landslide Augment: Leave a trail for 7s that petrifies enemies for 4s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Ore Gaze
description: Petrify Augment: Petrified enemies are scanned into the Codex and have a 10% chance to drop additional loot when killed.

ExportUpgrades.name: Tectonic Fracture
description: Tectonics Augment: Create up to 2 walls with 70% Health. Walls can no longer be turned into boulders.

ExportUpgrades.name: Prolonged Paralysis
description: Paralysis Augment: Affected enemies are pulled towards Valkyr and the stun duration is increased by 50%.

ExportUpgrades.name: Hysterical Fixation
description: Hysteria Augment: While Hysteria is active, each kill restores 5% Maximum Shields.

ExportUpgrades.name: Hysterical Assault
description: Hysteria Augment: Aim and then attack to leap onto enemies up to 15m away.

ExportUpgrades.name: Eternal War
description: Warcry Augment: While active, Warcry's duration is increased by 1.25s for each Melee Kill.

ExportUpgrades.name: Swing Line
description: Rip Line Augment: After using Rip Line, the next 1 Rip Lines will have no Energy cost while Airborne.

ExportUpgrades.name: Partitioned Mallet
description: Mallet Augment: Allows for two simultaneous Mallets, each with 70% reduced range.

ExportUpgrades.name: Conductor
description: Resonator Augment: Reactivate the ability to command Resonator to move to your aim point at 100% Speed.

ExportUpgrades.name: Resonance
description: Sonar Augment: Killing an enemy by shooting their weak spot will trigger another Sonar for 50% of remaining duration.

ExportUpgrades.name: Savage Silence
description: Silence Augment: Finisher Damage is increased by 150% while Silence is active.

ExportUpgrades.name: Sonic Fracture
description: Sonic Boom Augment: Enemy Armor is reduced by 35% for 2s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Resonating Quake
description: Sound Quake Augment: Forgoes channeling to create a shockwave that deals 10x Damage at the epicenter, gradually weakening as it expands out.

ExportUpgrades.name: Cold Snap
description: Cosmic Crush Augment: The black hole saps the area of heat, freezing enemies in range. Enemies near the black hole are completely frozen for |val|s.
Cosmic Crush Augment: The black hole saps the area of heat, freezing enemies in range. Enemies near the black hole are completely frozen for 2s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Energy Field
description: Energy Shell Augment: Energy Shell applies to allies within 80m.

ExportUpgrades.name: Afterburner
description: Core Vent Augment: <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage ignites exhaust fumes for |DURATION|s. Enemies passing through the flames take |DAMAGE| <DT_FIRE>Heat Damage.
Core Vent Augment: <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage ignites exhaust fumes for 6s. Enemies passing through the flames take 200 <DT_FIRE>Heat Damage.

ExportUpgrades.name: Escape Velocity
description: Worm Hole Augment: Allies that travel through wormhole gain a 30% Speed bonus for 4s.

ExportUpgrades.name: Neutron Star
description: Null Star Augment: On recast, all remaining particles will seek out enemies and deal 60 <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage with guaranteed Proc in 4m.

ExportUpgrades.name: Molecular Fission
description: Molecular Prime Augment: When killed, primed enemies will restore a Null Star charge and have a 25% chance of restoring an additional one.

ExportUpgrades.name: Antimatter Mine
description: Antimatter Drop Augment: Creates a fully charged stationary orb that explodes after 12s or within enemy proximity.

ExportUpgrades.name: Antimatter Absorb
description: Antimatter Drop Augment: Absorbs enemy bullets within 1m, increasing its damage when it explodes.
